main_definition: To make a choice or reach a conclusion after considering different options.

meanings_and_examples.example: I have decided to start exercising regularly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make up one's mind about a course of action
meanings_and_examples.example: She had to decide whether to go on the trip with her friends or stay home and study for an exam.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To come to a determination in a legal case
meanings_and_examples.example: The judge will decide the outcome of the trial tomorrow morning.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To choose between two or more possibilities or alternatives
meanings_and_examples.example: We decided on Italian cuisine for our date night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make an official judgment or decision, often by a group of people with authority
meanings_and_examples.example: The board of directors will decide the company's future direction in their next meeting.
